title: Identify the Ions
text: Ammonia $$NH_3$$ acts as a base and accepts a proton (H**+) from hydrochloric acid (HCl), which is a strong acid. This results in the formation of ammonium ion (NH_4**+) and chloride ion (Cl**-).

title: Write the Balanced Equation
text: Combine the ions to form the balanced chemical equation for the reaction between NH3 and HCl.
